articles.author: Abha Bhattarai, Shira Ovide
articles.title: Trump tariff price hikes could start with clothing, cars and coffee - The Washington Post
articles.description: Americans will bear the brunt of President Donald Trump’s new tariffs, with price increases kicking in almost immediately on cars, clothing, electronics and some groceries.
articles.content: Return to menuMuch of the fresh fruits and vegetables at U.S. supermarkets come from Mexico and Canada, which are not being hit with the latest round of tariffs. But shelf-stable items such as sugar,… [+1771 chars]

articles.author: Gina Heeb
articles.title: Bank Stocks Fall After Tariff Announcements - WSJ
articles.description: Bank stocks fell sharply after President Trump unveiled sweeping tariffs that some feared would hurt loan growth and quality.JPMorgan Chase and Bank of America dropped, as did U.S. Bancorp, PNC Financial Services, Truist Financial and Fifth Third. Higher pric…
